Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item carries a unique value that exceeds $800000 to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication. Considering its unparalleled features and benefits, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $750000. We believe this is an excellent opportunity for you to acquire a piece that not only adds significant value to your collection but also represents a wise investment. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
